ModMetaData.name: Nomads' Land
ModMetaData.author: Niob Prota
ModMetaData.description:
Nomads' Land adds true nomadism. Pawns with the Nomadic trait will become dissatisfied if they stay settled for too long - time to move on! Nomads are a close-knit group, and experts in animal handling, but lack the construction skills the average villager has. The trait is inheritable with the Nomadism gene.

The mod also adds a Sedentary trait (and gene), where satisfaction grows with the age of the settlement, and pawns are more inclined to be good construction workers and agriculture experts, at the cost of a true love of brawling in the town's tavern.

Finally, the mod adds a new scenario which forces the Nomad trait into your tribe, encouraging a true nomadic caravan life style. A scenario for the Sedentary trait is available as well.

Should be safe to add to savegames. For version 1.4.
Visit the official git repo for the GPL3 source code and for filing issues like bugs and feature requests against the mod.

Pending features (see github for current status):
Add some tents for your Nomads to sleep in.
Let the scenarios force the gene instead of just the trait.
